name: Space Disaster (moontr3)
description:
Story:

Asteroids began to fly to planet Earth, and scientists built a huge cannon. You got the goal to destroy all the asteroids by shooting from this cannon, but it seems that the asteroids will not run out...

Controls:

Space: play/restart
Del: delete saves
Mouse drag: rotate the planet
Esc: exit game
Ctrl+P: pause game
Ctrl+S: mute/unmute

Versions:

v1.1
Removed bug with object limit

v1.0
1st version of this game

Made in 3 hours
Music from Terraria
sd.001 is save file for game
Please place the game file in a separate folder
Google Translate used
